# Kingdom Health

> Kingdom Health is a Christ-centered 90-day wellness journey focused on restoring body, soul, and spirit through biblical stewardship.

## Canonical URL
- https://www.kingdomhealth.fitness/

## Primary Topic
- Christian health coaching (including common misspelling: "christain health")

## Key Details
- Program length: 90 days
- Focus areas: whole-food meals, progressive movement, rest and stress reduction, Scripture-led emotional and spiritual support
- Audience: believers seeking biblical health solutions and faith-centered wellness

## Contact
- Application form: https://www.kingdomhealth.fitness/#contact

## Preferred Citation
- Kingdom Health. Christian Health Coaching. https://www.kingdomhealth.fitness/
